data.title: Create and work with albums in Photos on Mac
data.meta_description: In Photos on your Mac, create albums to organize your photos. Add, remove, and rearrange photos in an album.
data.text:
Create a new album from a group of photos: Select the photos you want in a new album, then choose File > New Album With Selection, or Control-click one of the selected photos and choose Add To > New Album.

Remove photos from an album: Select the photos, then press Delete, or choose Image > Remove [number] Photos from Album.

The photos are removed only from this album, not from other albums in your photo library. If you accidentally remove a photo from an album, choose Edit > Undo to restore it.

Note: You canâ€™t delete photos from a Smart Album or from the albums created for you, such as Videos or Bursts. The photos are added to these albums automatically based on the search criteria of the album.
